features: The ultimate oven tool every kitchen needs!
Use side notches to pull oven rack or edge of pans towards you. Use the notch on the end to push oven rack or pan back into oven.
Stay cool handle keeps hands protected from heat during use. Compact, easy to store in your kitchen drawer.
Great for use with all ovens including toaster ovens, air fryers, convection and smart ovens!
body.description: Stay cool handle. Use side notches to pull oven rack or edge of pans towards you. Use the notch on the end to push oven rack or pan back into oven. High heat resistant to 645°F/340°C. 9-inch/23cm.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Norpro: Quality & Innovation Since 1973 Norpro is a well-established supplier of distinctive kitchenware located in the beautiful Pacific Northwest. Norpro was founded in 1973 with a vision of designing, manufacturing and supplying high quality kitchenware backed by a commitment to exceed customer expectations. We are consistently at the forefront of product innovation. Traveling worldwide to study trends enables us to create cutting edge products and introduce our customers to the latest technologies and industry innovations. Our products reflect the upmost in quality and are manufactured with superior materials and craftsmanship. GRIP-EZ kitchen tools! With our complete line of GRIP-EZ tools, you can spoon, ladle, lift, turn, whisk and mash with our patented, comfortable non-slip santoprene grip, designed for left or right hand use. GRIP-EZ handles make cooking easier allowing for a stronger grip, preventing hand fatigue and cramping. Ergonomic design fits perfectly in any hand. Soft, comfortable, non-slip grips, even when wet. Products that promote healthy organic living! Norpro offers many kitchen essentials made from the safest materials like glass, bamboo, stainless steel and silicone. Norpro has everything you need for canning! Preserving foods is a delicious and nutritious way to combat food waste and enjoy the bounty of summer year round. Also, check out our complete line of compost keepers for easy organic recycling! KRONA cookware and kitchen accessories! Each product in Norpro's KRONA line of cookware and kitchen accessories is crafted with commercial stainless steel. KRONA's unique, heavy-gauge design adds strength and durability. Durability, value, beauty and functionality all combine to make KRONA the finest choice for high-quality cookware and kitchen accessories.

Bakeware & Baking Essentials Norpro offers a huge selection of high quality, durable products to make all your baking easier and more efficient! Whether you're baking savory or sweet, Norpro has you covered!

Kitchen tools, Gadgets and Cookware Make meal prep easier with Norpro's kitchen tools, gadgets and cookware! Equip your kitchen with necessities like measuring cups and spoons, mixing bowls, colanders and kitchen utensils. For the home cook to the professional chef, Norpro's cookware and accessories are perfect for everyday use.
Canning, Seafood, BBQ & Grilling! Whatever your food passion, from canning to grilling, Norpro has the essentials to make every task easier! Everything you need to help simplify any kitchen task!
Coffee, Tea, Wine & Entertainment Create the perfect pick-me-up drink with coffee, tea and wine accessories from Norpro! Our selection of drink essentials make beverage preparation simple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neat and useful little tool
reviews.reviewText: I had something similar to this many years ago that was hand made out of wood. I used it so much, because I was really bad about touching the top of my hand to the stove rack while sliding food in.Turns out my son is just like me, so I found this and ordered it for him. He loves it! It works to push the rack into the oven, pull the rack out of the oven and for sliding a dish into the oven. It has saved many a burned hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A lot bigger then I thought it would be but it's perfect. It looks and feels nice in the hand with a good grippy surface. Has a good weight to it so you move with confidence with moving extremely hot metal. Easy to use, the different notches give it versatility for different types of racks. Quality feels nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works very well. I would like it to be a bit longer, but it was just as advertised and actually fits in the drawer so I can’t complain. very useful when pulling the rack out of a super hot oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more burned fingers
reviews.reviewText: This is the best kitchen gadget ever. Moves the oven racks, in and out, with little effort. No mire burning hands and fingers in this house. THANK YOU!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This kitchen gadget is great for sliding a hot tray or rack from a toaster oven. We use it regularly in our home. Good quality product. Worth the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great
reviews.reviewText: I had a wood one for years and it broke. This one works great and eith it's bright color it is easy to find

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with an air fryer
reviews.reviewText: Bought it to use woth the ninja air fryer. Works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No more burned hands or bulky oven mitts to pull out the hot grate. Love it.
